item.title: Coding mining
item.dc:creator: @WRX WRX`
item.description:
@WRX wrote:

ReplaceObject(objectX,objectY,objectID =+ 2, -1);

The plus may have to go before the =, thus making it…

ReplaceObject(objectX,objectY,objectID += 2, -1);

Do this for your other replacing objects and the minus signs also go before =.
Tell me your result.

Read full topic

item.title: Coding mining
item.dc:creator: @jr_pwn jr pwn
item.description:
@jr_pwn wrote:

Ok im a basic level coder and im trying to add mining into my server im useing an edited version of funscap3 heres the code i have right now for addy ores.

case 2104: case 2105: //adamant rock if(playerLevel[14] >= 30 && (HasItemAmount(1275, 1))) { setAnimation(449); sendMessage("you mine some mith Ore"); actionTimer = 25; addItem(447, 1); addSkillXP((1000*playerLevel[14]), 14); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else { sendMessage("You do not have a rune pickaxe!"); } break;

ok now i know all that does is give 1000 xp times the persons level and gives you an item.

now heres the code i have that doesnt fully work

case 2104: case 2105: //adamant rock if(playerLevel[14] >= 30 && (HasItemAmount(1275, 1))) { setAnimation(449); sendMessage("you mine some mith Ore"); actionTimer = 25; addItem(447, 1); addSkillXP((1000*playerLevel[14]), 14); ReplaceObject(objectX,objectY,objectID =- 2, -1); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else if(actionTimer <= 0){ ReplaceObject(objectX,objectY,objectID =+ 2, -1); } else { sendMessage("You do not have the required level to use this pickaxe!"); } break;

So my question is why dosent when i click on the rock and i have the pick axe and i have the right level why does it give me the mith rock but not change the rocks id?

Read full topic
